dcterms:creator: C. Lu
J. Shi
J. Jia
dcterms:description: CUHK Avenue is prepared from videos captured at the avenue of Chinese University of Hong Kong campus. It contains 16 training and 21 testing videos with 15,328 frames in the train set and 15,324 frames in the test set. Each frame has a resolution of 640 × 360 pixels. Pixel-level masks are provided for ground truth annotation for frames in the test set. The test set has 47 instances of abnormalities manifested over 3,820 anomalous frames.
dcterms:title: CUHK Avenue

dcterms:creator: W. Li
V. Mahadevan
N. Vasconcelos
dcterms:description: UCSD Ped1 is composed of 34 training and 36 testing videos whose frames have a resolution of 238 × 158 pixels. Each test video in Ped1 is sliced into 200 frames, and it is provided with full frame-level ground truth annotation and pixel-level annotation for 10 videos. The presence of car, wheelchair, bicycle, skateboard, and stepping on grass or wrong direction movement across the walkway are treated as abnormal behaviour.
dcterms:title: UCSD Ped1

dcterms:creator: W. Li
V. Mahadevan
N. Vasconcelos
dcterms:description: UCSD Ped2 contains 16 training and 12 testing videos with a frame resolution of 360 × 240 pixels. Each test video in Ped2 is sliced into 120, 150, and 180 frames. Ped2 has frame-level and pixel-level ground truth annotation for all test videos. The test set comprises of 2,010 frames from which 1,636 frames are treated as anomalous.
dcterms:title: UCSD Ped2
